comments.author: ulliver
comments.body: You might want to contact their lost+found desk at the airport. Tel : +33 8 20 14 24 10 (Open from 6am to 12pm). Good luck!

comments.author: TheBlackPajama
comments.body: Thanks, that's the first thing I did,but told her I would do everything possible! It was a loooong night last night :(
